title: Short Rest
content:
ithout needing to retreat from the area. You can only use 2 Short Rests before using a Long Rest after which all uses of Short Rest will be restored. The Song of Rest feature allows Bards to add another Short Rest for a total of 3. When using a Short Rest, 15 minutes of in-game time will pass. Perform a Short Rest by interacting with the Short Rest icon on the top right part of the screen, right of the minimap.

What is Recovered with Short Rest?

Each party member heals for half their Hit Point
